cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOYERNMENTPrinted for the War Cabinet. December 1942.SECEET.W.P. (42) 604.December22, 1942.Copy. No.WAR CABINET.REBUILDING OF THE HOUSE OF COMMONS.(References : W.P. (42) 523; W.M. (42) 154th Conclusions, Minute 4.)Note by the Secretary.THE annexed table, giving details of the labour force required for the rebuilding of the House of Commons, is circulated by direction of the PrimeMinister.(Signed) E. E. BRIDGES.Offices of the War Cabinet, S.W. 1,December 22, 1942.ANNEX.Number of Men.Labour according to age.Scheme "A."(" Carcase.")6 months' preparation :12 months' work.Scheme " B."(Permanent Finishings.)6 months' preparation :18 months' work.Over 40 and under 50Over 50Employed over first six monthsOver 40 and under 50Over 50 .........Employed over second six monthsOver 40 and under 50 ......Over 50 ...... .....Employed over third six monthsOver 40 and under 50 ,........Over 50 ......... .....Employed over fourth six months..232346185185370170170*. 340232346125125250125125250125125f250* Includes 50-60 old experienced craftsmen,t Includes 30-40 old experienced craftsmen.[24798]
